english.segment1: Why has your faith gone to nothing. Always pretending that you have made a stand. Leaving all this behind to disappear. Waiting, watching for the trends to let you in
english.segment2: I know your reasons, your claims, I see an answer, get back and fight. Where have you gone? What have you done?. When will you know? This is for Him
english.segment3: Pick up your cross, get back in the fight. Pick up your cross, get back in the fight
